TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An inherited increase in the risk of developing a disease. Also called genetic susceptibility.

Increased likelihood or chance of developing a particular disease due to the presence of one or more gene mutations and/or a family history that indicates an increased risk of the disease. Also called genetic susceptibility.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Aumento de la probabilidad de padecer de una enfermedad en particular. También se llama susceptibilidad genética.
